hypothesis_content.title: ETF Flow Catalyst with Regime Transition Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: Consecutive ETF outflows/inflows (>$300M cumulative over 3 days) will amplify regime transition signals, with price moving 1.8x further in the flow direction when crossing regime boundaries.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Recent $600M liquidations show ETF flows can hide larger macro catalysts. When regime transitions coincide with sustained ETF flows, institutional positioning creates momentum amplification. Current market shows sensitivity to ETF data post-options expiry.
entry_conditions: Regime transition signal triggers (confidence change > 15% in 24h)
Cumulative ETF flows > $300M in same direction over 3 days
Flow direction aligns with regime transition direction

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches 1.8x the average move of previous 3 regime transitions
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Regime confidence reverts > 10% from entry level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Regime transition with aligned ETF flows produces move < 1.2x historical transition average, or flows reverse within 24 hours.
